SEARCH
Package uiclasses

Class ResearcherUI

java.lang.Object
uiclasses.UserUI
uiclasses.ResearcherUI
public class ResearcherUI extends UserUI
The ResearcherUI class represents the user interface for a researcher user. It extends the functionality of the UserUI class and provides actions specific to a researcher, such as starting, dropping, viewing, and publishing research.

  • Method Details

    • startResearch

      public void startResearch() throws IOException
      Allows the researcher to start a new research. Takes input for the name, theme, field of study, and doi of the research.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • dropResearch

      public void dropResearch() throws IOException
      Allows the researcher to drop a research. Takes input for the name, theme, field of study, and doi of the research to be dropped.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • viewResearch

      public void viewResearch()
      Displays all research papers associated with the researcher.

    • publicResearch

      public void publicResearch() throws IOException
      Allows the researcher to mark a research as public (finished). Takes input for the name, theme, field of study, and doi of the research to be marked public.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • main

      public void main()
      The main method to execute the researcher user interface.
